OpenShift Center of Excellence

OpenShift COE Overview

This Git Organization is intended to assist OpenShift SME’s with a number of core areas related to solution architectures.

  1. The diagram below depicts the core areas covered by associated repos. Demos/Workshops Repo POC Repo Reference/Arch Repo Customer/Adoption Repo
